#summary jWizard Configuration Options
#labels Featured

=Javascript Definition of Default Values=
{{{
var defaults = {
	enableValidation: false,
	hideCancelButton: false,
	hideTitle: false,
	/* CSS Classes */
	stepDivClass: 'step',
	buttonsDivClass: 'buttons',
	titleDivClass: 'title',
	cancelButtonClass: 'wizardButton',
	previousButtonClass: 'wizardButton',
	nextButtonClass: 'wizardButton',
	finishButtonClass: 'wizardButton',
	/* Events */
	onCancel: function() { alert('Cancel Button Clicked'); },
	onStepChange: function() { return true; },
	onValidateStep: function() { return true; },
	onFinish: function() { alert('Finish Button Clicked'); }
};
}}}

----

=Configuration Options=
==General==
|| *Parameter Name* || *Type* || *Description* || *Default Value* ||
|| hideCancelButton || boolean || Determines whether or not to show the Cancel `<button>` at all || false ||
|| enableValidation || boolean || _(NOT YET IMPLEMENTED)_ Determines whether or not to activate the Validation Events. || false ||
|| hideTitle || boolean || Determines whether or not to show the title of the current wizard step. || false ||

==CSS Classes==
|| *Parameter Name* || *Description* || *Default Value* ||
|| buttonsDivClass || Applies to the `<div>` surrounding the buttons. || buttons ||
|| stepDivClass || Applies to the `<div>` surrounding all of the steps in the wizard. || step ||
|| cancelButtonClass || Applies to the Cancel `<button>`. || wizardButton ||
|| previousButtonClass || Applies to the Previous `<button>`. || wizardButton ||
|| nextButtonClass || Applies to the Next `<button>`. || wizardButton ||
|| finishButtonClass || Applies to the Finish `<button>`. || wizardButton ||

==Custom Events==
|| *Parameter Name* || *Description* || *Default Value* ||
|| onCancel || Fired off when the Cancel `<button>` is clicked. || function() {} ||
|| onFinish || Fired off when the Finish `<button>` is clicked. || function() {} ||
|| onStepChange || Fired off after the Next or Previous `<button>` is clicked and before the Step is actually changed. || function() {} ||
|| onValidateStep || _(NOT YET IMPLEMENTED)_ Handles the validation of a given step. || function() { return true; } ||
